definition: to live at home/to stay at home/home (schooling etc)/in-home (care etc)/household (repairs etc)/living (environment etc)
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: She complained to the police about the barking of her neighbour's dog.
sentences.chinese: 她向警方抱怨鄰居家的狗叫聲。

sentences.english: Hair drier and electric iron is popular in our life.
sentences.chinese: 吹風機與電熨斗已經成爲普及的居家電器。

sentences.english: Homes, for small minor quick fix on most soft plastics.
sentences.chinese: 用於居家，爲小較小快速修復在多數軟的塑料。

sentences.english: Dream House is to show the back of HGTV Entertainment in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 夢之家是一個展示在居家頻道娛樂製作正午在美國。

sentences.english: She often runs across to the neighbour's house to have a good gossip.
sentences.chinese: 她經常跑到鄰居家去閒聊。

sentences.english: Besides that- I helped the children in the neighbourhood with their lessons.
sentences.chinese: 除了這些，我還扶持鄰居家的孩子做功課。

sentences.english: John went to his neighbor's home to borrow his lawnmower.
sentences.chinese: 約翰到鄰居家借剪草機。

sentences.english: But just who is this 6) goddess of 7) homemaking?
sentences.chinese: 可是，這位居家生活女神到底是何方神聖？

sentences.english: Office workers, families and schoolchildren amble past.
sentences.chinese: 上班族，居家者，學生在這裏漫步走過。

sentences.english: He would be play mad after drunk, North Korea cause I had neighbors running.
sentences.chinese: 他醉酒後就會耍酒瘋，害得我只好朝鄰居家跑。

sentences.english: The garden has been walled off from the neighbours'.
sentences.chinese: 花園用牆和鄰居家的花園劃開。

sentences.english: Beneath that chintz housecoat beats a heart of pure evil.
sentences.chinese: 隱藏在印花布居家服下面的是一顆純邪惡的內心。

sentences.english: e.g My boyfriend can cook very well. He is so domesticated!
sentences.chinese: 我男朋友很會煮菜，他很居家。

sentences.english: Such sofa suits to advocate to reside the personage of a style rustically however oneself most.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的沙發最適合崇尚自然而樸素的居家風格的人士。

sentences.english: At-home care is another service of the Tsu - chi Hospital.
sentences.chinese: 居家關懷也是慈濟醫院的服務項目之一。

sentences.english: Last Friday these family men left for the Naches River.
sentences.chinese: 上星期五，這幾個居家男人一起去了納切斯河。

definition: leisure/relaxation/not working/idle/to enjoy leisure/to lie fallow
style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
as fresh and clean as nature (idiom)
next-door neighbor/neighboring household/adjacent country (short for 鄰接的國家|邻接的国家[lin2 jie1 de5 guo2 jia1])
Qingxin county in Qingyuan 清远, Guangdong
drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
